Dekha dekha kara citta kī, 
granthi sulajhatī jāya. 
Jāge vimala Vipaśyanā, 
citta mukta ho jāya. 

Dekha dekha kara citta kī, 
granthi sulajhatī jāya. 
Aisi jāge Vipaśyanā, 
citta mukta ho jāya.

translations.translation:
Observe the mind steadfastly 
to disentangle its knots. 
May stainless Vipassana arise 
to liberate the mind. 

Observe the mind steadfastly 
to disentangle its knots. 
May stainless Vipassana arise 
to liberate the mind.

–S.N. Goenka

Stebėkite protą tvirtai, 
Išspręskite jo painiavą.
Tegu iškyla tyra Vipasana,
Ir jį išlaisvina.

Observe a mente com firmeza
para desembaraçar seus nós.
Que Vipassana imaculada surja
para libertar a mente.

堅定地觀察心
以解除心結。
願無瑕內觀生起
使心解脫。
